net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.component.listener

Class ResetDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.pandoragames.far.ui.swing.component.listener.ResetDispatcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    SearchBaseHasChangedListener

    public class ResetDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener
    Listens to a RESET command and updates depending components.
    Author:
    Olivier Wehner at 03.03.2008
